PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-10422015-06-30,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectIndian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission
PrecisOrder (1) extending the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission ending December 31, 2015; and (2) specifying that, effective June 30, 2015, the mandate of the Commission and of the Commissioners for the period of the extension shall be the mandate set out in the Order of the Supreme Court of British Columbia dated June 26, 2015 bearing Court file number L051875.
AttachmentsAttachment
